name: Tecmo World Cup '94
overview:
World Cup '94 was produced by Tecmo in 1994.

This is a sequel to the 1990 original. It is a four-player soccer game that has nice graphics, music, zoom and scroll. Compete against 16 other countries for the world cup!

As in World Cup '90, the best way to score is with a crossing shot across the goal, followed by a header or bicycle kick. A high kick inside the goal crease usually goes over the net.
